mapper.select: select ed.*, ep.name as config_name, ep.title as config_title, ep.type as config_type, ep.applies_to as config_appliesTo, ep.tips, ep.masked, ep.required, ep.default_value, ep.allowed_values, ep.mode_required from t_engine_endpoint ed left join t_engine_ep_properties ep on ed.type = ep.endpoint_type where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_engine_endpoint (id, name, description, project_id, type, mode, configs, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{projectId}, #{type}, #{mode}, #{configs}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update t_engine_endpoint set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, project_id = #{projectId}, type = #{type}, mode = #{mode}, configs = #{configs}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, status = #{status}, del_flag = #{delFlag} where id = #{id}
